definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
people are in a terrible situation (idiom)

sentences.english: Enjoying life takes time to appreciate the Natural and cultural richness around us.
sentences.chinese: 享受人生可以是去欣賞我們周圍的大自然和各種生靈。

sentences.english: The earth was saved when a strong archer, Hou Yi, succeeded in shooting down 9 of the suns.
sentences.chinese: 弓箭手後翌射下了9個太陽，拯救了地球上的生靈。

sentences.english: It of the life be all vitalities psyches that the natures living to work properly spirit.
sentences.chinese: 它的命就是所有自然生靈精神的元氣魂魄。

sentences.english: The air is precious to the red man for all things share the same breath.
sentences.chinese: 空氣對於我們也是寶貴的，因爲萬物生靈都一同呼吸。

sentences.english: In the boundless twilight, this herd of beautiful creatures are silhouetted by the rays of evening sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 暮色蒼茫中，這一羣美生靈被霞光勾勒出一片剪影。

sentences.english: Odin hopes his son will learn humility among the earthlings.
sentences.chinese: 奧丁希望他的兒子在地球的生靈中學會謙卑。

sentences.english: It is a world dominated by The Magisterium, which seeks to control all humanity.
sentences.chinese: 這是個被教主統治的世界，目的是控制整個生靈。

sentences.english: Thirty years ago, in 1949, I was a changeling who became a human again.
sentences.chinese: 三十年前，我就從一個換生靈重新變成了人類。

sentences.english: War broke out again, plunging the people into misery and suffering.
Well, monkeys make us smile, too, because they are creatures full of playful tricks.
sentences.chinese: 猴子也能讓我們發笑，因爲它們是花樣百出的生靈。

sentences.english: No more lives will be consumed by your hatred.
sentences.chinese: 你的憎恨將不再貽害更多生靈。

sentences.english: When your grandfather was alive, he killed many animals, and brought his fate down upon himself.
sentences.chinese: 你祖父活着時，殺了很多的生靈，因此折了陽壽。

sentences.english: All animals are smothered in their lairs.
sentences.chinese: 所有的小生靈都躲在巢穴裏冬眠。

sentences.english: Like creatures that only come out in the night.
sentences.chinese: 像那些僅在夜裏出世的生靈。

sentences.english: To save the lives of all the creatures below, Goddess Nü Wa patched the sky with stones.
sentences.chinese: 爲拯救天下的生靈，女媧用大石補住了天空。

sentences.english: When the new heaven and earth shall own The Prince of Peace their King.
sentences.chinese: 當知新天新地生靈，共戴和平之君。

definition: lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
lit. mole cricket and ants/fig. tiny individuals with no power
cage/trap (e.g. basket, pit or snare for catching animals)/fig. bonds (of wrong ideas)/shackles (of past misconceptions)/to trap/to shackle
to reincarnate/reincarnation (Buddhism)/(of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically/cycle/CL:個|个[ge4]
